subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Players typically rank quality of the golf course and the spot on the calendar as their top reasons for playing, so the lack of so many top 20 players — injuries aside — for the July 3-6 event was surprising.
snippet: Players typically rank quality of the golf course and the spot on the calendar as their top reasons for playing, so the lack of so many top 20 players — injuries aside — for the July 3-6 event was surprising.
